mapper.select: SELECT ANY_VALUE(r.id) as id, r.openid as openid, ANY_VALUE(r.wallet) as wallet, ANY_VALUE(r.currentUnpaid) as currentUnpaid, ANY_VALUE(r.reportHashRate) as reportHashRate, ANY_VALUE(r.averageHashRate) as averageHashRate, ANY_VALUE(r.lastDayProfit) as lastDayProfit, ANY_VALUE(r.profitTime) as profitTime, ANY_VALUE(r.createTime) as createTime, ANY_VALUE(r.updateTime) as updateTime FROM ( SELECT * FROM profits WHERE openid in (#{openid}) OR wallet in (#{wallet}) ORDER BY profitTime DESC LIMIT 1000 ) r GROUP BY openid
mapper.insert:
